about_the_game:
Crime Chronicles: The Hidden Truth is an immersive adventure game in the genre of courtroom drama and detective investigation, inspired by the popular Ace Attorney series. Dive into a world of complex crimes and intense courtroom battles. In this game, you take on the role of Detective Liam Stark, working alongside Prosecutor Emilia Hall to solve a challenging murder case.

Key Features:


Captivating Investigation: Delve into the details of the Edmund Harrison murder case, analyzing evidence, interrogating witnesses, and solving puzzles.

Dynamic Courtroom Drama: Participate in tense courtroom sessions where every testimony and choice you make impacts the case. Interact with the prosecutor and defense attorney to uncover the truth.

Choice-Driven Outcomes: Your decisions will shape the direction of the investigation and courtroom proceedings. Choose the right testimonies to strengthen the prosecution or challenge the defense.

Multiple Scenarios: Depending on your choices, the game offers different endings and story branches, making each playthrough unique.

Crime Chronicles: The Hidden Truth provides a thrilling experience where every decision matters. Unravel the web of mysteries, find the truth, and achieve justice!
